name: fiery-dance
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
Cloaked in flames, the user dances
and flaps its wings. It may also
raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

and flaps its wings. It may also
raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
